snippet.title: Tavern Keeper 🍻 Official Gameplay Trailer [4K] | Greenheart Games
snippet.description:
Watch now the gameplay trailer reveal of our upcoming game Tavern Keeper 🍻! A new charming fantasy business sim, a creative decoration sandbox, and a humorous choose-your-path storybook all in one from Greenheart Games, the devs of Game Dev Tycoon. Coming to PC in Q4 2024.
WISHLIST TAVERN KEEPER NOW ON STEAM: https://ghg.to/cmTQ

Follow us to get the latest updates!
‣ Greenheart Games Discord: discord.gg/greenheartgames
‣ Greenheart Games on TikTok: tiktok.com/@greenheartgames
‣ Greenheart Games on Twitter: twitter.com/GreenheartGames
‣ Tavern Keeper on Twitter: twitter.com/TavernKeeper
‣ Game Dev Tycoon on Twitter: twitter.com/GameDevTycoon
